titleStmt.title: The fraternitie of uacabondes As wel of rufling uacabonds, as of beggerly, as wel of wemen as of men, and as wel of gyrles, as of boyes, with their proper names and qualityes. Also the. xxv. orders of knaues, otherwyse called a quatren of knaues. Confirmed thys yere by Cocke Lorel. ...
titleStmt.author: Awdelay, John, fl. 1559-1577.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdely, dwelling in lytle Brittain streete, beyond Aldersgate,
publicationStmt.date: The. 13. day of December. Anno. do. 1565.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: consists of title page only.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
